dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT QOV.OD_OB_PS_ID OD_OB_PS_ID ,QOV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM OD_PB_PROJ_NUM ,QOV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,QOSV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM SKU_OD_PB_PROJ_NUM ,QOSV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME ,QOSV.OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC ,QOSV.OD_OB_SKU OD_OB_SKU ,QOSV.OD_PB_ITEM_DESC OD_PB_ITEM_DESC ,Qov.Od_Ob_Vendor_Name Od_Ob_Vendor_Name ,QOV.OD_ob_FACTORY_NAME OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME ,QOV.OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS ,QOV.OD_PB_FACTORY_CONTACT OD_PB_FACTORY_CONTACT ,QOV.OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL ,QOV.OD_SC_REGION OD_SC_REGION ,QOV.OD_PB_DATE_REQUESTED OD_PB_DATE_REQUESTED ,QOV.OD_PB_ATTACHMENT OD_PB_ATTACHMENT ,QOV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME ,QOV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL ,QOV.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS ,QOV.OD_PB_DATE_REPORTED OD_PB_DATE_REPORTED ,QOV.OD_PB_COMMENTS OD_PB_COMMENTS FROM Q_OD_OB_PS_V QOV ,Q_OD_OB_PS_SKU_V QOSV WHERE QOV.OD_OB_PS_ID = QOSV.OD_OB_REF_PS_ID(+) AND NVL(QOV.OD_OB_PS_ID,'X') = NVL(:P_PS_ID,NVL(QOV.OD_OB_PS_ID,'X')) AND NVL(QOV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM,'X') = NVL(:P_PROJECT,NVL(QOV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM,'X')) AND NVL(QOV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X') =NVL(:P_SOURCING_AGENT,NVL(QOV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X')) AND NVL(QOSV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_DEPT_NAME,NVL(QOSV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(QOSV.OD_OB_SKU,1) = NVL(:P_SKU,NVL(QOSV.OD_OB_SKU,1)) AND NVL(QOV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = Nvl(:P_Vendor_Name,Nvl(Qov.Od_Ob_Vendor_Name,'X')) And Nvl(Qov.Od_ob_Factory_Name,'X') = NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME,NVL(QOV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(QOV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER,NVL(QOV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(QOV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER,NVL(QOV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')) AND NVL(QOV.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X') = Nvl(:P_Approval_Status,Nvl(Qov.Od_Pb_Approval_Status,'X')) ORDER BY QOV.OD_OB_PS_ID,QOV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM,QOSV.OD_OB_SKU DESC
